channel.title: Read this or u may be sorry (Don't lock it's actually helpful)
channel.description:
Hello, i am credit pwnz debit and i am coming around to show you this new admin stoppin forum site i made http://tfasp.goodforum.net/ It has a chat box and everything.But here is the point,I made these forums to stop peaple from jipping other peaple of there runescape accounts.I have given over 3 runescape account and this is what happens after igive them the rs accs (i know the process my friend got 15 rs accs in a week 90+)
Step one:They take ur acc tell u to logout and give u admin
Step two:Their on a diff tab and change ur rs pass and delete you recoveries
Step Three:They let u have ur 15 min of fame then ban u /and or never turn server back on again.
Step four: U have lost ur rs acc and get pissed and take ur anger out on objects.
Now the picture (I caught this kid after he took my 89 he wanted my 110)
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/24e87r6.jpg[/img]
He told me to logg out and iped me..
Come join the forums posted about to stop this.
How we stop them:
We ask them if they can sell us admin like in the picture.
They say yes we say are u sure.
They say yes then we print screen and paste it here and on forums ( http://tfasp.goodforum.net/ )
This is all demostrated in the picture but still i like writing it out.
Peaple jipp you so never buy admin offa them.
I Beleave this should be stickied but im just a lil boy.
Do you beleave it should be stickied? Post it then ;)
Enjoy this while u can so never buy status or this will happen!!!!!!
-Credit Pwnz Debit
